summary: Successfully tested login with email/password and captured dashboard screenshots. Login flow works correctly with testuser@test.com / test123456. Dashboard loads with all components: 4 KPI cards, Revenue Trend chart, Job Status donut chart, Recent Job Cards table, AI Activity feed, and full sidebar navigation.

issues: Console warning: chart width/height -1 - minor Recharts sizing issue on initial load (same as iteration_16)
